tool_description: Generates comprehensive daily schedules for diagnostic imaging departments including all appointments, staff assignments, and equipment usage.

schedule_date.description: Date for which to generate the schedule

facility_id.description: Identifier for the veterinary facility or clinic

include_staff_breaks.description: Whether to include staff break times in the schedule

include_maintenance.description: Whether to include equipment maintenance times

error_messages: Invalid schedule date: Date must be valid and not more than 30 days in the past.
Facility not found: The specified facility_id does not exist in the system.
No data available: No appointments or activities found for the specified date and facility.
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to generate schedule for this facility.
usage: Provide schedule_date and facility_id to generate a complete daily schedule; optionally include staff breaks and maintenance activities.

schedule_summary.description: Overview of the day's activities and resource utilization

appointments.description: Array of scheduled appointment details with times and resources

staff_assignments.description: Array of staff member schedules and assignments

equipment_usage.description: Array of equipment usage throughout the day

total_appointments.description: Total number of appointments scheduled for the day
